result.eng: A bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.html: Leagadh buidéal uisce beatha roimheA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.
result.ponchtml: Leagaḋ buidéal uisce beaṫa roiṁeA bottle of whiskey was put in front of him.

result.eng: She was kicking the pavement gravel in front of herself.
result.ga: Bhí sí ag ciceáil ghairbhéal an chosáin amach roimpi
result.orig: Bhí sí ag ciceáil ghairbhéal an chosáin amach roimpi

result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ag ciceáil ġairḃéal an ċosáin amaċ roimpiShe was kicking the pavement gravel in front of herself.
